sqlMap.select: select J14, J4, USERCENTER, J15, J12, J11, CHANX, J9, J13, DANW, J7, J1, XUQCFRQ, J0, ID, J8, J3, j0rq, J10, SHIYCJ, LINGJBH, J6, J2, ZHIZLX, J5, wulgyyz from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzj_tmp where 1 = 1

select hz.usercenter as usercenter, hz.lingjbh as lingjbh, hz.chanx as chanx, hz.zhizlx as zhizlx, hz.shiycj as shiycj, hz.danw as danw, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j0riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j0, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j1riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j1, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j2riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j2, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j3riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j3, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j4riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j4, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j5riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j5, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j6riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j6, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j7riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j7, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j8riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j8, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j9riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j9, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j10riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j10, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j11riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j11, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j12riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j12, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j13riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j13, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j14riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j14, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j15riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j15, hz.xuqcfrq as xuqcfrq, to_date(substr(#j0riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j0rq, to_date(substr(#j1riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j1rq, to_date(substr(#j2riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j2rq, to_date(substr(#j3riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j3rq, to_date(substr(#j4riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j4rq, to_date(substr(#j5riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j5rq, to_date(substr(#j6riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j6rq, to_date(substr(#j7riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j7rq, to_date(substr(#j8riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j8rq, to_date(substr(#j9riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j9rq, to_date(substr(#j10riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j10rq, to_date(substr(#j11riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j11rq, to_date(substr(#j12riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j12rq, to_date(substr(#j13riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j13rq, to_date(substr(#j14riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j14rq, to_date(substr(#j15riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j15rq, hz.waibms from (select distinct ad.usercenter, ad.lingjbh, ad.chanx, ad.zhizlx, ad.shiycj, ad.danw, ad.xuqrq, ad.xuqsl, ad.xuqcfrq, cw.waibms from (select q.usercenter as usercenter, q.lingjbh as lingjbh, q.chanx as chanx, q.zhizlx as zhizlx, x.dinghcj as shiycj, q.danw as danw, q.xuqrq, sum(q.xuqsl) as xuqsl, t.xuqcfsj as xuqcfrq from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxq t, ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqmx q , ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj x where t.xuqbc = q.xuqbc and q.usercenter = #usercenter# and q.xuqbc = #xuqbc# and q.usercenter = x.usercenter and q.lingjbh = x.lingjbh and q.zhizlx = #zhizlx# and q.chanx = #chanx# group by q.usercenter, q.lingjbh, q.chanx, q.zhizlx, x.dinghcj, q.danw, q.xuqrq, t.xuqcfsj) ad, ( select usercenter, lingjbh , shengcxbh, zhizlx, waibms from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj where waibms = 'VJ' ) cw where ad.usercenter = cw.usercenter(+) and ad.chanx = cw.shengcxbh(+) and ad.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh(+) and cw.zhizlx = #zhizlx# ) hz group by hz.usercenter, hz.lingjbh, hz.chanx, hz.zhizlx, hz.shiycj, hz.danw, hz.xuqcfrq, hz.waibms

select usercenter, lingjbh, chanx, zhizlx, shiycj, danw, 0 as j0, 0 as j1, 0 as j2, 0 as j3, 0 as j4, 0 as j5, 0 as j6, 0 as j7, 0 as j8, 0 as j9, 0 as j10, 0 as j11, 0 as j12, 0 as j13, 0 as j14, 0 as j15, '' as xuqcfrq, to_date(substr(#j0riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j0rq, to_date(substr(#j1riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j1rq, to_date(substr(#j2riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j2rq, to_date(substr(#j3riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j3rq, to_date(substr(#j4riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j4rq, to_date(substr(#j5riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j5rq, to_date(substr(#j6riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j6rq, to_date(substr(#j7riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j7rq, to_date(substr(#j8riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j8rq, to_date(substr(#j9riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j9rq, to_date(substr(#j10riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j10rq, to_date(substr(#j11riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j11rq, to_date(substr(#j12riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j12rq, to_date(substr(#j13riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j13rq, to_date(substr(#j14riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j14rq, to_date(substr(#j15riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j15rq, waibms from (select a.usercenter , a.lingjbh, a.shengcxbh chanx, a.zhizlx, b.dinghcj shiycj, b.danw, 0 as xuqsl, to_date( to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as xuqcfrq, a.waibms from ${dbSchemal1}ckx_wullj a, ${dbSchemal1}ckx_lingj b where waibms = 'VJ' and a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.lingjbh = b.lingjbh and a.zhizlx = #zhizlx# and a.lingjbh = #lingjbh#)

select hz.usercenter as usercenter, hz.lingjbh as lingjbh, hz.chanx as chanx, hz.zhizlx as zhizlx, hz.shiycj as shiycj, hz.danw as danw, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j0riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j0, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j1riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j1, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j2riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j2, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j3riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j3, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j4riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j4, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j5riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j5, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j6riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j6, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j7riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j7, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j8riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j8, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j9riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j9, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j10riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j10, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j11riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j11, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j12riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j12, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j13riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j13, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j14riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j14, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j15riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),hz.xuqrq,hz.xuqsl,0)) as j15, hz.xuqcfrq as xuqcfrq, to_date(substr(#j0riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j0rq, to_date(substr(#j1riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j1rq, to_date(substr(#j2riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j2rq, to_date(substr(#j3riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j3rq, to_date(substr(#j4riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j4rq, to_date(substr(#j5riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j5rq, to_date(substr(#j6riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j6rq, to_date(substr(#j7riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j7rq, to_date(substr(#j8riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j8rq, to_date(substr(#j9riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j9rq, to_date(substr(#j10riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j10rq, to_date(substr(#j11riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j11rq, to_date(substr(#j12riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j12rq, to_date(substr(#j13riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j13rq, to_date(substr(#j14riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j14rq, to_date(substr(#j15riq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd') as j15rq, hz.waibms from (select distinct ad.usercenter, ad.lingjbh, ad.chanx, ad.zhizlx, ad.shiycj, ad.danw, ad.xuqrq, ad.xuqsl, ad.xuqcfrq, cw.waibms from (select q.usercenter as usercenter, q.lingjbh as lingjbh, '' as chanx, q.zhizlx as zhizlx, '' as shiycj, q.danw as danw, q.xuqrq, sum(q.xuqsl) as xuqsl, t.xuqcfsj as xuqcfrq from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxq t, ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqmx q where t.xuqbc = q.xuqbc and q.usercenter = #usercenter# and q.xuqbc = #xuqbc# and q.zhizlx = #zhizlx#
group by q.usercenter, q.lingjbh,
q.zhizlx,
q.danw, q.xuqrq, t.xuqcfsj) ad, ( select distinct usercenter, lingjbh , '' as shengcxbh, zhizlx, 'NJ' as waibms from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj where waibms != 'PJ'
) cw where ad.usercenter = cw.usercenter(+)
and ad.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh(+) and cw.zhizlx = #zhizlx# ) hz group by hz.usercenter, hz.lingjbh, hz.chanx, hz.zhizlx, hz.shiycj, hz.danw, hz.xuqcfrq, hz.waibms
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzj_tmp ( J14, J4, USERCENTER, J15, J12, J11, CHANX, J9, J13, DANW, J7, J1, XUQCFRQ, J0, ID, J8, J3, j0rq, J10, SHIYCJ, LINGJBH, J6, J2, ZHIZLX, J5, J1RQ, J2RQ, J3RQ, J4RQ, J5RQ, J6RQ, J7RQ, J8RQ, J9RQ, J10RQ, J11RQ, J12RQ, J13RQ, J14RQ, J15RQ, wulgyyz, waibms ) values( #j14#, #j4#, #usercenter#, #j15#, #j12#, #j11#, #chanx#, #j9#, #j13#, #danw#, #j7#, #j1#, to_date(substr(#xuqcfrq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), #j0#, ${dbSchemal1}MAOXQHZPFPXH_SEQ.nextval, #j8#, #j3#, to_date(substr(#j0rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), #j10#, #shiycj#, #lingjbh#, #j6#, #j2#, #zhizlx#, #j5#, to_date(substr(#j1rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j2rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j3rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j4rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j5rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j6rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j7rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j8rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j9rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j10rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j11rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j12rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j13rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j14rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#j15rq#,0,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), #wulgyyz#, #waibms# )
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzj_tmp set J14=#j14#, J4=#j4#, USERCENTER=#usercenter#, J15=#j15#, J12=#j12#, J11=#j11#, CHANX=#chanx#, J9=#j9#, J13=#j13#, DANW=#danw#, J7=#j7#, J1=#j1#, XUQCFRQ=#xuqcfrq#, J0=#j0#, ID=#id#, J8=#j8#, J3=#j3#, j0rq=#j0rq#, J10=#j10#, SHIYCJ=#shiycj#, LINGJBH=#lingjbh#, J6=#j6#, J2=#j2#, ZHIZLX=#zhizlx#, J5=#j5# where 1=1
ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzj_tmp where 1 = 1
USERCENTER = #usercenter# LINGJBH = #lingjbh# CHANX = #chanx#
